description: Application user account associated with the sent message (typically the sender/owner of the outbox entry; confirm whether this denotes the mailbox owner vs. sender).
System-generated identifier or sequence number for the message, used to reference the specific notification; likely sequential within the table or per user. Confirm numbering scope with SME.
Short title of the notification presented to recipients.
Full text content of the notification delivered to recipients.
Delivery/read status of the message (e.g., unread/read); confirm complete code list with SME.
Sender account identifier for the message; may be a username or alias rather than an email address.
Primary recipient identifier(s) for the message; often a username, employee ID, or group code rather than an email address.
Secondary recipients copied on the message.
Recipients copied without visibility to other recipients.
User or process that created the message record.
Timestamp when the message record was created/sent.
User or process that last modified the message record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the message record.
